name: Aramide
description:
'''Aramide''' is a Nigerian [[Afro-soul]] singer and songwriter. She won Best Vocal Performance (Female) for "Iwo Nikan" at the [[The Headies 2015|Headies 2015]]. She graduated with a [[political science]] degree from the [[University of Jos]].

In 2019, Aramide was appointed by [[The Recording Academy]] to the board of governors for the Washington, D.C. chapter of the Academy.
